channel.title: 3 Problems
channel.description:
I will Rep+ if you help me with these, I may even pay if you help with [COLOR="Magenta"]ALL 3[/COLOR], and do them correctly, and they aren't messed up. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- OVERLOAD'S ---------------------------------------------------- You drink the pot, receive the message, "You are to weak to drink this again". You log, and you are then allowed to drink the potion again. How can I make the pot reset when you log, or make it to where the stats can't be edited while they are over 115, then they would simply raise back to 120.
So, Drink the pot 120/99, log off, log back on, drink pot, 140/99, repeat process! ----------------------------------------------------
Summoning ---------------------------------------------------- Ok, you spawn an npc, and if you have one already spawned, it simply drops it instead. But if you log, the familiar doesn't disappear, he comes back again, and you simply can summon another one. ----------------------------------------------------
Npc ---------------------------------------------------- Npc 959, A'abla or whatever, currently heals only hitpoints, and I was wanting Her to do prayer & special aswell. I had special before, but you could keep stacking it up, so how would I make her only give 100, and if you have more then it doesn't work. Like say, your 0 special, and she gives you 100 special (Full bar), and if you have full special, then it says "you already have full special." ----------------------------------------------------
Base - Delta Msn: [email]pritchardthomas@yahoo.com[/email]
If you have any questions about my codes/ints/booleans/or anything involved with these codes, message me through MSN.

item.title: 3 Problems
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

I will Rep+ if you help me with these, I may even pay if you help with [COLOR=“Magenta”]ALL 3[/COLOR], and do them correctly, and they aren’t messed up.

OVERLOAD’S

You drink the pot, receive the message, “You are to weak to drink this again”.
You log, and you are then allowed to drink the potion again.
How can I make the pot reset when you log, or make it to where the stats can’t be edited
while they are over 115, then they would simply raise back to 120.

So, Drink the pot 120/99, log off, log back on, drink pot, 140/99, repeat process!

Summoning

Ok, you spawn an npc, and if you have one already spawned, it simply drops it instead.
But if you log, the familiar doesn’t disappear, he comes back again, and you simply
can summon another one.

Npc

Npc 959, A’abla or whatever, currently heals only hitpoints, and I was wanting
Her to do prayer & special aswell.
I had special before, but you could keep stacking it up, so how would I make her only give 100, and if you have more then it doesn’t work.
Like say, your 0 special, and she gives you 100 special (Full bar), and if you have full special, then it says “you already have full special.”

Base - Delta
Msn: pritchardthomas@yahoo.com

If you have any questions about my codes/ints/booleans/or anything involved with these codes, message me through MSN.
